text: Fail-Safe is a 1964 American Cold War thriller movie directed by Sidney Lumet and was based on the 1962 novel of the same name by Eugene Burdick and Harvey Wheeler. It stars Henry Fonda, Walter Matthau, Dan O'Herlihy, Frank Overton, Fritz Weaver, Edward Binns, Larry Hagman, Dom DeLuise and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1964 thriller movies Category:1964 war movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Apocalyptic movies Category:Cold War movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Nebraska
title: Fail-Safe (1964 movie)
